title: Major track fault causing delays on North-South Line

title_translations.zh-Hans: 南北线主要轨道故障导致延误
title_translations.ms: Ralat trek utama menyebabkan kelewatan di Laluan Utara-Selatan
title_translations.ta: வடக்கு-தெற்கு பாதையில் தாமதத்தை ஏற்படுத்தும் முக்கிய பாதை தவறு

updates.text: [NSL] CLEARED: Train service from #Yishun to #JurongEast is running normally now.
[NSL] Expect additional 10mins travelling time from #Yishun to #JurongEast due to a track fault near #Kranji.
